## CounterStyleStatic.numericFromUnicodeRange property

Create a numeric system renderer from a UTF-16 code unit and a base. The set of numerals for this range will be generated by incrementing `originUnicode` with every integer in range \[0, `base` - 1\].

See [CSS Counter Styles Level 3, Positional Numerals: the numeric system](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-counter-styles-3/#numeric-system)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
numericFromUnicodeRange: (originUnicode: number, base: number) => CounterStyleRenderer;
```
